channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP_SE -- SAP PowerDesigner
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP_SE -- SAP PowerDesigner

item.title: CVE-2023-37483|2024-10-10T19:00:59.714Z -- sap_se -- sap%20powerdesigner
item.description: SAP PowerDesigner - version 16.7, has improper access control which might allow an unauthenticated attacker to run arbitrary queries against the back-end database via Proxy.

item.title: CVE-2023-36923|2024-10-10T19:03:13.309Z -- sap_se -- sap%20powerdesigner
item.description: SAP SQLA for PowerDesigner 17 bundled with SAP PowerDesigner 16.7 SP06 PL03,Â allows an attacker with local access to the system, to place a malicious library, that can be executed by the application. An attacker could thereby control the behavior of the application.

item.title: CVE-2023-37484|2024-10-10T19:28:52.145Z -- sap_se -- sap%20powerdesigner
item.description: SAP PowerDesigner - version 16.7, queries all password hashes in the backend database and compares it with the user provided one during login attempt, which might allow an attacker to access password hashes from the client's memory.
